title: Understanding Health Equity
text: Health equity is about ensuring everyone has the same opportunities to achieve their best health. It involves removing obstacles such as poverty, discrimination, and their consequences.

title: Key Aspects of Health Equity
text: Consider factors like access to healthcare, education, and safe environments. Health equity aims to provide these equally to all individuals.

hintAnswer: when everyone has a fair opportunity to obtain optimal health
title: Identifying Health Equity
text: Which of the following best describes health equity?
choices: a person’s understanding of their own culture and its impact on themselves
when everyone has a fair opportunity to obtain optimal health
imposition of one’s own values, beliefs, and practices upon another person or group
the client is offered a choice to withdraw from a stressful situation and go to another location
